title: Looking for players to form a social team
body:
I'm not a super hardcore league players however i do enjoy playing with other good players.
Not looking for competitive or anything just a group of cool people to queue with. I have most voip programs and a mic. I have played over 2000 games and am happy to play any role. Add me in game if youre keen.
Name: Brigsy
OCE.

replies.body:
Add me if you want. Give us a shout out in game.

IGN: Frostwolf77

I would like to add you on my team if your game
hope to get a reply soon
